original_text: And they could not take hold of his words before the people: and they marvelled at his answer, and held their peace.
korean_text: 그들이 백성 앞에서 그의 말을 능히 책잡지 못하고 그의 대답을 놀랍게 여겨 침묵하니라

sentences.original_text: And they could not take hold of his words
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그의 말을 붙잡을 수 없었고

sentences.original_text: and they marvelled at his answer,
